com.xhive.versioning.interfaces
Interface XhiveVersionSpaceIf

public interface XhiveVersionSpaceIf

Represents the context of the document where Versions of the document are stored.

(c) X-Hive Corporation B.V. (www.x-hive.com)

Since:
X-Hive/DB 2.0

Method Summary
 java.util.Iterator<? extends XhiveBranchIf> getBranches()

Method Detail

getBranches

java.util.Iterator<? extends XhiveBranchIf> getBranches()

Get an iterator containing all the branches in the versionspace.

Returns:
The iterator containing all the branches in the versionspace.

getVersionById

XhiveVersionIf getVersionById(java.lang.String id)

Get a version by id from this versionspace.

Parameters:
id - the Id of the version in this versionspace.
Returns:
The version with Id id, null when the version does not exist

getVersionByLabel

XhiveVersionIf getVersionByLabel(java.lang.String label)

Get a version by label from this versionspace.

Parameters:
label - the label of the version in this versionspace.
Returns:
The version with Label label, null when the version does not exist

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Gets the name of this version-space. Since release 6.0.1, this name is no longer guaranteed to be unique. You cannot currently set the name yourself. If the document that was first versioned has a name, that name is used as the identifier, otherwise an id:uniqueid name will be returned.

See ObjectFinder::getVersionSpaceUniqueId of the Adminclient sources on how to get a unique id of a versionspace.

Returns:
the auto-determined name of the versionspace.

remove

void remove()
Deletes a version-space from a library. This will remove all version-related information stored for this versioned document.
